## Rerata dan Variasi Skor Matematika

```{r}
rerata_var_matematika <- read_excel("set-data/xmrlsh.xlsx", 
    sheet = "Table I.B1.2.1", skip = 8, n_max = 84) %>% 
  rename(negara = ...1,
         skor_rerata = `Mean score`,
         se_rerata = S.E....3,
         sd = S.D.,
         se_sd = S.E....5,
         skor_10 = Score...6,
         se_10 = S.E....7,
         skor_25 = Score...8,
         se_25 = S.E....9,
         skor_50 = Score...10,
         se_50 = S.E....11,
         skor_75 = Score...12,
         se_75 = S.E....13,
         skor_90 = Score...14,
         se_90 = S.E....15,
         selisih_90_10 = `Score dif.`,
         se_selisih_90_10 = S.E....17) %>% 
  filter(!negara %in% c("OECD", "Partners"))

write_csv(rerata_var_matematika,
          file = "set-data/rerata_var_matematika.csv")

```
